name: Delicious (March 2013) Simplified
description: Simpified and much cleaner version of the most recent update (as of March 2013) of Delicious. Swapped tags list to right side of screen & removed "other-user's comments" sidebar completely.
additional_info: Unfortunately, because the other-user's comments sidebar is gone, you can't see who else has previously saved a bookmark. I've tried to make it as resizeable-friendly as possible but there are still a couple of glitches. It should work for most small screen sizes though. 5-APR-2013 Small edit (not shown in screenshot): increased width of site-header so that links to network, bookmarks, etc. don't overlap. Also increased size of search bar so that it doesn't become unusable as you resize the window.
